titulo: Myths and Legends of Our Own Land — Volume 04 : Tales of Puritan Land

This volume delves into the rich tapestry of legends from the Puritan settlements in New England, exploring the trials, tribulations, and tales of its inhabitants, including themes of love, loss, and the supernatural.
